questions.question: She is oily ..................... but she does not have a kind heart.
‘Can I borrow some milk?’ ‘Why not? We have ...................... and some to spare.’
Don’t depend on him. He is a man of ..............................
questions.description: Used to refer to a person who has a weak character

questions.question: We were already going through a financial crisis so dad's illness was a bolt from the ……………………….
questions.description: A sudden and unexpected event that is usually harmful.

questions.question: Her refusal to answer his phone calls was a red rag to the .........................
questions.description: An act or utterance that is going to provoke someone.

questions.question: After wasting two hours searching for the cat, we realized we were on a wild ........................... chase.
questions.description: A wild goose chase is a search that is completely unsuccessful.

questions.question: When the business failed, years of hard work went up in ...........................
He thinks he is highly influential but he is actually a big ....................... in a small pond.
questions.description: When you are a big fish in a small pond, you have a lot of influence only over a small area.

questions.question: Giving advice to this worthless fellow is like casting pearls before a .........................
questions.description: To cast pearls before a swine is to talk wisely to fools.

questions.question: He is a tough guy and will weather any ……………………….
questions.description: To weather a storm is to face difficulties.
